fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Single market, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Communication
eu_initiatives: Strenghtening the European clothing and fashion industry through the use of the latest ecommerce and digitalization technologies and the set-up of local distributed fabrication facilities, green supply chains and c2c platforms (prosumers networks)
goals__remit:
Driving the expansion of ecommerce. 
 
Provide ecommerce consultancy and expertize to the sector of the clothing and fashion industries and other industries as well, including digitalisation of the whole value chain (use of internet), fabrication, marketing and sales, order processing, supply chains and logistics, customization and made-to-measure, legal aspects and safety issues, circular economy.
relevant_communication: Promotion of the digital economy through the organisation of conferences, exhibitions and other events (ex awarding), the use of many different communication channels, networking and more
